item.description: Monotone for Silverlight 1.1 Alpha with source code.

item.description: Load BAML and view XAML syntax.

item.description: Reading local variable names from PDB files. Enable in options dialog.

item.title: Assembly list support in .NET Reflector
item.description: Create and switch multiple lists of assemblies. Go to File menu and Open List.

item.description: New download location for Documentor. Travis Illig will provide future updates.
